attributes.action: Politicians must act together to prevent further damage post-EU referendum
attributes.additional_details: The undersigned believe in a fair, inclusive and progressive United Kingdom. Our politicians need to engage constructively with each other to heal the divide caused by the referendum and to behave like our elected leaders. We therefore require the government and those in opposition to work to minimise the damage to the economy of leaving the EU and to negotiate future trade with our current EU partners to secure the opportunities that we have enjoyed for subsequent generations.
attributes.background: We believe in a fair, inclusive and progressive United Kingdom. Instead of perpetuating negativity which will cause further damage, our politicians need to engage constructively with each other to heal the divide caused by the referendum and behave like our elected leaders.
